caption.p:
Expansions of the GDD 5 ≥ 1200 areas as projected by the seven GCMs; graphs include both boreal and non-boreal zones, as distributed across latitudes. All models consistently showed expansion of GDD 5 ≥ 1200 areas up to the end of the 21 st century. Map created using ArcGIS Desktop v. 10.4.1
65 .
